page.title: 05Worlingworth Parish Council
page.content: What is the main issue under discussion by the Parish Council currently? To prevent depopulation of the village by providing suitable cheaper homes for young copuples.Negotiations with a Housing Association are taking place. What are the next 5 issues discussed by the Parish Council over the past year? 1 problems with local charities.2 The County Structure Plan of the County Council.3 The issue of a news letter by the Parish Council.4 Provision 2 trophies for the village produce show.5 purchase of a village snow plough. What plans for the future? To maintain the viability of the village by pressuring the County Council,encouraging young people to stay & generally fostering a community spirit.
